channel.title: Chat messages prefixed with a / should return an error to the player when entered
channel.description: ^Subject, pretty much. Accidental whisper messups do happen in this game.

item.title: Chat messages prefixed with a / should return an error to the player when entered
item.dc:creator: robflop
item.description:
Right-click on a player in the player list to open a window that lets you whisper them without having to do /w <number> to avoid this.

Read full topic
item.source: Chat messages prefixed with a / should return an error to the player when entered
